description_html:
The Focal Point design team delivered on its mission to create a modern luminaire that embodies the flexibility in designing with an LED light source with the creation of Obscura. More than a linear suspended LED luminaire, Obscura exudes an air of mystery with a seemingly invisible light source to become a functional architectural statement. Obscura is creatively engineered to balance beauty and functionality with a wide batwing distribution (80% indirect and 20% direct lighting). This allows for increased spacing between luminaires; up to 16' on center.

Its soft yet powerful illumination, up to 129 LPW, meets the stringent energy efficiency standards of the DesignLights Consortium® (DLC). In addition to the optics and illumination qualities, Obscura offers personalization with individual lengths from 4' to 12' in 1' increments and modern finishes: White or Palladium Silver exterior body and White or Infinity interior end caps. Furthering its minimalist design, Obscura integrates Focal Point’s Power-Up™ technology where power is delivered through the aircraft suspension cables, eliminating the visual clutter of power cords.

Features:
• Hidden optics provide an air of mystery with a seemingly invisible light source
• 4’ – 12’ individual units in 1’ increments
• Powerful optic with up to 1200 Lm/ft
• 80 direct/20 indirect distribution
• Low-voltage power is delivered through suspended cables
• Exterior finishes: White and Palladium Silver
• Interior finishes: White and Infinity
